1 Under USERRA, uniformed services consist of the following: Army, Navy, Marine Corps, Air Force,
Coast Guard, Army Reserve, Naval Reserve, Marine Corps Reserve, Air Force Reserve, Coast Guard
Reserve, Army National Guard, Air National Guard, Commissioned Corps of the Public Health Service and
any other category of persons designated by the President in time of war or emergency.  State laws may
expand the uniformed services definition
